content: > for help and community join our free > fb group 1 **all my heart bag** **difficulty** intermediate **materials** alize klasik burcum 100 gr 100% premium acrylic 210 meter / 230 yards total use of 38 grams 87 yards or any weight #4 yarn hook us size 4 5 mm and 4mm for joining the strap yarn needle scissors measuring tape **gauge** not relevant **sizes** each square is 6 x 6 **notes** this pattern is written in us terminology this pattern is worked in rounds chain 3 does count as st at the beginning of each round ch1 at the beginning of the row does not count as a stitch this pattern consists of two identical squares and a strap i used multiple colors for a more vibrant style you can choose a solid color or more stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
